name: pebbe on github
body:
# Personal repositories

Below is a list of my more important personal repositories. A complete list is [here](https://github.com/pebbe?tab=repositories).

## ZeroMQ

 - [zmq4](https://github.com/pebbe/zmq4) — A Go interface for ZeroMQ versions 4.0, 4.1
 - [zmq3](https://github.com/pebbe/zmq3) — A Go interface for ZeroMQ versions 3.2, 3.3
 - [zmq2](https://github.com/pebbe/zmq2) — A Go interface for ZeroMQ versions 2.1, 2.2

## Astronomy

 - [novas](https://github.com/pebbe/novas) — A Go interface to the Naval Observatory Vector Astrometry Software (NOVAS) 
 - [gonova](https://github.com/pebbe/gonova) — A Go wrapper for libnova — Celestial Mechanics, Astrometry and Astrodynamics Library

## Cartography

 - [go-proj-4](https://github.com/pebbe/go-proj-4) — Go bindings for the Cartographic Projections Library PROJ.4

## Text analysis

 - [textcat](https://github.com/pebbe/textcat) — A Go package for n-gram based text categorization, with support for utf-8 and raw text
 - [libtextcat](https://github.com/pebbe/libtextcat) — A Go wrapper for libtextcat

## Databases

 - [dbxml](https://github.com/pebbe/dbxml) — A basic Go interface to Oracle Berkeley DB XML
 - [c_dbxml](https://github.com/pebbe/c_dbxml) — A basic C interface to Oracle Berkeley DB XML 

***

# Work repositories

Below are repositories I contributed to the github group [rug-compling](https://github.com/rug-compling).

 - [PaQu](https://github.com/rug-compling/paqu) — Parse & Query
 - [alpinocorpus-go](https://github.com/rug-compling/alpinocorpus-go) — Go bindings for [alpinocorpus](https://github.com/rug-compling/alpinocorpus)

***

# Other stuff

 - [my personal homepage](http://pkleiweg.home.xs4all.nl/)
 - [my work homepage](http://www.let.rug.nl/~kleiweg/)
 - [my work contact page](http://www.rug.nl/staff/p.c.j.kleiweg/)
